author: Special Correspondent
text:
Velammal Medical College, in association with The Hindu and The Hindu Tamil, brings to music connoisseurs of Madurai a weekend filled with music.

The two-day musical event is to be conducted at the Velammal Medial College on February 6 and 7. There will be a saxophone concert by Kadri Gopalnath on February 6, followed by a vocal concert by Nityashree Mahadevan on February 7. Admission to the music concerts, which will begin at 6 p.m., is free. For invitations and more details, contact 0452 2510114 and 9444414332.
title: Free music concerts
